mapping.title: {{ values['case.subject'] }}
mapping.attachments: [{% set fileCount = 0 %}{% for file in values['attribute.woo_publicatie'] %}{% if fileCount > 0 %}, {% endif %}"/api/v1/case/{{id}}/document/{{file.uuid}}/download"{% set fileCount = fileCount + 1 %}{% endfor %}{% for file in values['attribute.woo_inventarisatielijst'] %}{% if fileCount > 0 %}, {% endif %}"/api/v1/case/{{id}}/document/{{file.uuid}}/download"{% set fileCount = fileCount + 1 %}{% endfor %}{% for file in values['attribute.woo_informatieverzoek'] %}{% if fileCount > 0 %}, {% endif %}"/api/v1/case/{{id}}/document/{{file.uuid}}/download"{% set fileCount = fileCount + 1 %}{% endfor %}{% for file in values['attribute.woo_besluit'] %}{% if fileCount > 0 %}, {% endif %}"/api/v1/case/{{id}}/document/{{file.uuid}}/download"{% set fileCount = fileCount + 1 %}{% endfor %}]
